name: Ricky Iwasaki
title: Software Engineer
summary: An Experienced Software Developer, seeking new opportunity to work for big projects. Interested in creating or adding code for others to use. I believe my skills are small compared to the internet, so I am very interested in working with other tools, services, programming languages.

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Architected and implemented scalable web applications using React and Node.js
Collaborated with product managers to refine requirements and ensure timely delivery
Developed and maintained RESTful APIs for web applications
Developed scripts to automate tasks and improve efficiency

experience.title: Assistant Tennis Coach
responsibilities: Teaching tennis techniques in a group setting of 5-10 players
Making the lesson fun and intertaining for the players
Responsible for the safety of the players on the court, especially the younger and older players, like 3 year olds and 60 year olds

experience.title: Outbound Associate
responsibilities: Loading orders onto the delivery trucks
Helping customers find items in the store
Keeping the warehouse clean and organized
Keeping a safe and friendly enviroment for the customers and employees

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: A responsive website showcasing projects and skills using modern web technologies
